extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:auto !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0;} #site-translate-header-wrapper::after {clear: both;} #site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} #main .infoic00, #main .infoic01, #main .infoic02, #main .infoic03, #main .infoic04, #main .infoic05, #main .infoic06, #main .infoic07, #main .infoic08, #main .infoic09, #main .infoic11, #main .infoic12, #main .infoic13, #main .infoic14, #main .infoic15, #main .infoic28{width: auto;padding: 6px;} @media screen and (min-width: 1281px) { /* body {display: block;} */ header .header_wrapper{margin: 44px auto 0; height: 110vh;} #index {border-collapse: separate;border-spacing: 2px 0;width: 100%;} #index .page-title .bx-wrapper{margin: 44px 0 0;}#index #schedule + nav ul li a span {font-size: 115%;} #index #user h2 span{width: auto;}} @media screen and (max-width: 1280px) and (min-width: 961px) {#index{width: 100%;}} @media screen and (min-width: 961px) { header .header_wrapper .global ul li:nth-child(4) a, header .header_wrapper .global ul li:nth-child(5) a {font-size: 70%;} header .header_wrapper .global ul li:nth-child(1) a, header .header_wrapper .global ul li:nth-child(2) a, header .header_wrapper .global ul li:nth-child(3) a, header .header_wrapper .global ul li:nth-child(6) a{font-size: 70%;}} @media screen and (max-width: 960px) { header .header_wrapper .global_tablet label a {font-size: 60%;}} @media screen and (max-width: 600px) { header.sp {height: 70px;margin: 44px auto 0;}}
